name: 炼金：鞑契
description: 炼金：鞑契共30张卡牌，将于2025年4月30日上线万智牌：竞技场。感谢轻脚翻译并制作中文卡图。

cards.name: Hamza, Might of the Yathan
cards.text:
Whenever a creature you control is turned face up, it `endures` X, where X is that creature's toughness.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, `seek` a creature card and `manifest` it.
cards.zhs_text:
每当一个由你操控的生物翻回正面时，它`续战`X，X为该生物的防御力。
地落～每当一个由你操控的地进场时，`取出`一张生物牌并`显化`它。

cards.name: Dragonblood Twins
cards.text:
`Double team`
Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, until end of turn, this creature has base power and toughness 4/4 and gains `flying`.
cards.zhs_text:
`双打`
连咒～每当你施放每回合中你的第二个咒语时，直到回合结束，此生物的基础力量与防御力为4/4且获得`飞行`异能。

cards.name: Thunderbond Vanguard
cards.text:
Thunderbond Vanguard's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.
Each creature token you control enters as a copy of this creature.
cards.zhs_text:
霆绊先锋的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的生物数量。
每个由你操控的衍生生物均当成此生物的复制品来进场。
